"火山洞窟で楽しみましょうねえ":
"Is it fun being a ranger? The most fun
thing for Lisa is concentrating on one
prey and bringing it down. Lisa doesn't
bother trying to work with other people,
because Lisa gets carried away.

Would you like to go with Lisa and have
fun as Rangers?
※A-Rank+ clear as a Ranger,
solo con Lisa."
